title: Duplicate

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Use the abilities you are given.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You have 2 lives. The first time you would die, you do not, and instead gain 2 role's abilities and attributes (assuming they do not harm you).

> You may multitask.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Live to see the end of the game after losing one of your lives.

desc:
Post 1223
*"Don't ask me why dying makes me two people."*
